description.french: Terminez la partie "La grande évasion".
description.german: Schließe das Kapitel "Die große Flucht" ab.
description.japanese: 「大脱走」をクリアする
description.spanish: Acabar la parte "La gran fuga".

description.french: Terminez la partie "Ça sent vraiment mauvais".
description.german: Schließe das Kapitel "Hier stinkt es gewaltig" ab.
description.italian: Completa il capitolo "Qualcosa puzza di losco".
description.japanese: 「凄まじい悪臭」をクリアする
description.spanish: Acabar la parte "Algo huele mal".

description.french: Terminez la partie "Dans la gueule du loup".
description.german: Schließe das Kapitel "In der Höhle des Löwen" ab.
description.italian: Completa il capitolo "Nella tana del leone".
description.japanese: 「虎穴の中」をクリアする
description.spanish: Acabar la parte "En casa del enemigo".

displayName.japanese: ジャングルへようこそ

description.french: Terminez la partie "Bienvenue dans la jungle".
description.german: Schließe das Kapitel "Willkommen im Dschungel" ab.
description.japanese: 「ジャングルへようこそ」をクリアする
description.spanish: Acabar la parte "Bienvenidos a la jungla".

description.french: Terminez la partie "La caserne".
description.japanese: 「兵舎」をクリアする
description.spanish: Acabar la parte "Los barracones".

description.french: Terminez la partie "Soucis techniques".
description.japanese: 「工学的問題」をクリアする
description.spanish: Acabar la parte "Problemas de ingeniería".

description.brazilian: Complete a parte "As docas de Boom".
description.french: Terminez la partie "Boom docks".
description.japanese: 「ブームドックス」をクリアする
description.spanish: Acabar la parte "Los muelles de Boom".

displayName.english: A THOUSAND EYES ARE WATCHING YOU

description.brazilian: Completar a parte "Mil olhos te vigiam".
description.english: Complete "A Thousand Eyes Are Watching You".
description.french: Terminez la partie "Un millier d'yeux vous surveillent".
description.german: Schließe das Kapitel "Tausende Augen beobachten dich" ab.
description.italian: Completa il capitolo "Mille occhi ti stanno guardando".
description.japanese: 「一千の目」をクリアする
description.schinese: 完成「上千只眼观察着你」。
description.spanish: Acabar la parte "Mil ojos te vigilan".

description.brazilian: Complete a parte "O coração de Jericó".
description.french: Terminez la partie "Le coeur de jericho".
description.german: Schließe das Kapitel "Im Herzen von Jericho" ab.
description.italian: Completa il capitolo "Il cuore di Jerico".
description.japanese: 「ジェリコの中心」をクリアする
description.spanish: Acabar la parte "El corazón de Jericó".

description.french: Terminez le jeu.
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアする
description.spanish: Acabarse el juego.

description.french: Atteindre le niveau 2.
description.japanese: レベル2になる
description.spanish: Subir a nivel 2.

description.french: Atteindre le niveau 4.
description.japanese: レベル4になる
description.spanish: Subir a nivel 4.

description.french: Atteindre le niveau 6.
description.japanese: レベル6になる
description.spanish: Subir a nivel 6.

description.french: Atteindre le niveau 8.
description.japanese: レベル8になる
description.spanish: Subir a nivel 8.

description.french: Atteindre le niveau 10.
description.japanese: レベル10になる
description.spanish: Subir a nivel 10.

description.french: Obtenez les photos de Robert.
description.japanese: ロバートの写真を回収する
description.spanish: Conseguir las fotos de Robert.

description.brazilian: Termine o jogo sem usar nenhum penico.
description.english: Finish the game without using a potty.
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans utiliser de pot de chambre.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne einen Pott zu benutzen.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza usare un vasino.
description.japanese: 携帯便器を使わずゲームをクリアする
description.spanish: Acabarse el juego sin usar ningún orinal.

displayName.english: SORT OF CHILDISH, DON'T YOU THINK?
displayName.japanese: 子どもっぽいとは思わないかね？

description.french: Neutralisez 5 gardes à l'aide de la fronde.
description.japanese: スリングショットで衛兵を5人無力化する
description.schinese: 用弹弓压制 5 位守卫。
description.spanish: Abatir a 5 guardas con el tirachinas.

description.french: Soignez 20 guardes.
description.japanese: 衛兵を20人治療する
description.spanish: Curar a 20 guardas.

description.french: Endormez 20 guardes.
description.japanese: 衛兵を20人眠らせる
description.spanish: Dormir a 20 guardas.

displayName.japanese: レイジ・アゲインスト・ザ・マシーン

description.french: Détruisez 5 drones en les frappant.
description.japanese: ドローン5台をパンチして破壊する
description.schinese: 用拳头破坏 5 架无人机。
description.spanish: Acabar con 5 drones a puñetazos.

description.brazilian: Destruir o tanque-robô do General X sem usar granadas eletromagnéticas.
description.english: Destroy General X's robo-tank without using electromagnetic grenades.
description.french: Détruisez le robot-tank du Général X sans utiliser de grenades électromagnétiques.
description.german: Zerstöre General X's Robo-Panzer, ohne EMP Granaten zu benutzen.
description.italian: Distruggi il robo-tank del Generale X senza usare granate elettromagnetiche.
description.japanese: 電磁グレネードを使わず、ジェネラルXのロボタンクを破壊する
description.koreana: 전자기 수류탄을 사용하지 않고 엑스 장군의 로봇 탱크 파괴하기
description.russian: Уничтожьте робо-танк генерала Икс без использования электромагнитных гранат.
description.schinese: 不用电磁波榴弹来破坏 X 上将的坦克。
description.spanish: Destruir el robo-tanque del General X sin usar granadas electromagnéticas.

description.french: Obtenez 5 pots de chambre.
description.japanese: 携帯便器を5つ回収する
description.spanish: Conseguir 5 orinales.

description.french: Fabriquez un cocktail Molotov.
description.japanese: 火炎瓶をクラフトする
description.spanish: Fabricar un cóctel molotov.

description.english: Kill 5 Human-Piranha-hybrid things with the shredders.
description.french: Tuez 5 hybrides Piranha-Humain avec les broyeurs.
description.italian: Uccidi 5 ibridi Piranha-Umani con i tranciatori.
description.japanese: シュレッダーで怪物ピラニアマンを5匹切り刻む
description.russian: Пропустите 5 гибридов человека и пираньи через измельчитель.
description.schinese: 用粉碎机杀死 5 只食人鱼人。
description.spanish: Provocar que 5 hombres-piraña mueran triturados.

description.french: Détruisez 9 araignées mécaniques.
description.japanese: メカスパイダーを9台破壊する
description.spanish: Destruir 9 arañas mecánicas.

description.english: Die while tampering with items from your inventory.
description.french: Mourez en manipulant des objets dans votre inventaire.
description.german: Stirb, während du Gegenstände in deinem Inventar bastelst.
description.italian: Muori combinando oggetti nel tuo inventario.
description.japanese: インベントリのアイテムをいじって死ぬ
description.schinese: 在锻造物品栏东西时死去。
description.spanish: Morir combinando objetos en el inventario.

displayName.french: PAS DE PITIÉ POUR LES CAMIONS

description.brazilian: Destruir 5 caminhões no estacionamento norte dos quartéis antes que sejam destruídos por Mike Metralha com seu tanque.
description.english: Destroy 5 trucks in the barracks north parking lot before SPLASH MIKE does with his tank.
description.french:
Détruisez 5 camions dans le parking nord de la caserne avant
que Mike la Mitraille ne le fasse avec son tank.
description.german: Zerstöre 5 Trucks im nördlichen Fuhrpark bei den Baracken, bevor es Maschinengewehr-Mike mit seinem Panzer macht.
description.italian: Distruggi 5 camion nel parcheggio nord della caserma prima che Machine-Gun Mike lo faccia con il suo carro armato.
description.japanese: 兵舎の北側駐車場にある5台のトラックを、スプラッシュ・マイクが操縦する戦車よりも先に破壊する
description.koreana: 기관총 마이크보다 먼저 막사 북부 주차장의 트럭 5대 파괴하기
description.russian: Уничтожьте 5 грузовиков на северной парковке у бараков прежде, чем это сделает Майк на своём танке.
description.schinese: 在机关枪麦克用坦克破坏前，自己先破坏北方停车场的 5 辆卡车。
description.spanish: Destruir 5 camiones en el parking norte de los barracones antes que los destruya Salpicadero Mike con su tanque.

description.brazilian: Passar pelas sepulturas sem destruir nenhuma porta de cela.
description.english: Complete the catacombs without destroying any cell gates.
description.french: Terminez les catacombes sans détruire aucune porte de cellule.
description.german: Schließe das Kapitel "Die Baracken" ab, ohne eine Zelle zu zerstören.
description.italian: Completa le catacombe senza distruggere le porte delle celle.
description.japanese: 牢を一つも壊さず、地下墓地をクリアする
description.koreana: 묘실 문을 하나도 파괴하지 않고 지하 묘지 완료하기
description.russian: Пройдите Катакомбы, не уничтожив ни одной решётчатой двери.
description.schinese: 在不破坏任何闸门的状况下完成地下墓穴。
description.spanish: Pasarse las catacumbas sin destrozar ninguna puerta de celda.

description.english: Have 90 or more bullets at the same time.
description.french: Avoir 90 balles ou plus.
description.japanese: 一度に銃弾を90発以上所持する
description.schinese: 拥有 90 颗或更多子弹。
description.spanish: Acumular 90 balas o más.

description.brazilian: Destruir 5 caixas com uma só granada.
description.english: Destroy 5 crates with the explosion of a single grenade.
description.french: Détruisez 5 caisses avec une seule grenade.
description.german: Zerstöre 5 Kisten mit einer einzigen Granate.
description.italian: Distruggi 5 casse con una sola granata.
description.japanese: グレネード1個で箱を5つ破壊する
description.schinese: 用一颗手榴弹破坏 5 个货箱。
description.spanish: Destruir 5 cajas con una sola granada.

description.brazilian: Descubra pelo menos 15 áreas secretas do jogo.
description.french: Trouvez 15 secrets dans le jeu.
description.japanese: シークレットを15個見つける
description.schinese: 在游戏里找到 15 个秘密。
description.spanish: Descubrir al menos 15 secretos del juego.

description.brazilian: Derrote o SEWERJUNK sem usar o lança-chamas.
description.english: Defeat Sewerjunk without damaging it with the Flamethrower.
description.french: Battez DÉGOUTRITUS sans utiliser le lance-flammes.
description.german: Besiege SEWERJUNK, ohne den Flammenwerfer zu benutzen.
description.italian: Sconfiggi SEWERJUNK senza usare il lanciafiamme.
description.japanese: 火炎放射器を使わず、スワージャンクを倒す
description.koreana: 화염방사기를 사용하지 않고 하수구의 쓰레기 물리치기
description.schinese: 不用喷火器打败下水道破烂堆。
description.spanish: Derrotar a SEWERJUNK sin usar el lanzallamas.

displayName.english: DANCE OF THE BLADE AND GUN

description.brazilian: Derrote TAKUMA TAKAGASHI sem deixar que ele se cure.
description.english: Defeat TAKUMA TAKAGASHI without letting him heal himself.
description.french: Battez TAKUMA TAKAGASHI sans le laisser se soigner.
description.german: Besiege TAKUMA TAKAGASHI, ohne dass er sich selbst heilt.
description.italian: Sconfiggi TAKUMA TAKAGASHI senza permettergli di curarsi.
description.japanese: タカガシ・タクマを、治療のチャンスを与えずに倒す
description.koreana: 타쿠마 타카가시가 자가 치유하기 전에 물리치기
description.russian: Победите ТАКУМА ТАКАГАШИ, не дав ему подлечиться.
description.schinese: 在高樫拓馬不治疗自己的情况下打败他。
description.spanish: Derrotar a TAKUMA TAKAGASHI sin que llegue a curarse.

description.brazilian: Destruir todas as portas dos banheiros do jogo.
description.french: Cassez toutes les portes des toilettes.
description.italian: Distruggi tutte le porte delle toilette
description.japanese: トイレのドアを全て破壊する
description.spanish: Destrozar todas las puertas de los lavabos del juego.

description.french: Battez GÉANGUILLE en ne tirant que 6 torpilles.
description.japanese: 魚雷6発で巨大ウナギを倒す
description.schinese: 使用 6 颗鱼雷来打败 HUGEEL。
description.spanish: Derrotar a HUGEEL disparando solo 6 torpedos.

displayName.japanese: スプラッシュダメージ

description.brazilian: Não deixar caixas ou caminhões sobrando ao vencer o tanque.
description.english: Let SPLASH MIKE destroy all crates and trucks at the barracks.
description.french: Laissez le tank de Mike la Machine détruire toutes les caisses et les camions à la caserne.
description.german: Lass den Panzer alle Kisten und Trucks in der Barracke zerstören.
description.italian: Permetti al carro armato di distruggere tutte le casse e i camion alla caserma.
description.japanese: 兵舎にある、全ての箱とトラックをスプラッシュ・マイクに破壊させる。
description.koreana: 탱크로 막사의 모든 상자와 트럭 파괴하기
description.russian: Позвольте танку уничтожить все коробки и грузовики в бараках.
description.schinese: 让坦克破坏兵营里所有的货箱和卡车。
description.spanish: Conseguir que no queden ni cajas ni camiones al vencer al tanque.

description.brazilian: Na contagem regressiva para salvar a doutora, alcance o andar térreo em menos de um minuto.
description.english: Reach the ground floor in less than a minute when rushing to save the doctor.
description.french: Atteignez le Rez-de-chaussée en moins d'une minute au moment de la course pour sauver la docteur.
description.german: Erreiche die unterste Ebene in weniger als 1 Minute wenn du versuchst, die Doktorin zu retten.
description.italian: Raggiungi il pian terreno in meno di un minuto quando corri a salvare il dottore.
description.japanese: ドクターを救うために走ることになった際、1分以内に1階へ到達する
description.koreana: 의사를 구하러 달려갈 때 1분 안에 1층에 도착하기
description.russian: Спасая доктора, доберитесь до нужного этажа меньше, чем за минуту.
description.schinese: 在一分钟内到达底层来抢救医生。
description.spanish: En la cuenta atrás para salvar a la doctora, llegar a la planta baja en menos de un minuto.

description.brazilian: Termine o jogo no modo difícil.
description.english: Finish the game on hard difficulty.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode difficile.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel auf schwer ab.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco alla modalità difficile.
description.japanese: ハード難易度でクリアする
description.schinese: 在困难模式下完成游戏。
description.spanish: Acabarse el juego en modo difícil.

description.brazilian: Alcance o máximo de experiência possível em pelo menos 5 capítulos do jogo.
description.english: Get the maximum experience possible in at least 5 chapters.
description.french: Obtenez le maximum d'expérience possible dans au moins 5 chapitres.
description.german: Erhalte die maximalen Erfahrungspunkte in mindestens 5 Kapiteln.
description.italian: Ottieni la massima esperienza possibile in almeno 5 capitoli.
description.japanese: 少なくとも5チャプター内で、経験値を最大まで獲得する
description.russian: Не упустите ни одной возможности заработать опыт как миниум в пяти главах.
description.schinese: 最少在 5 个章节内获得最多经验值。
description.spanish: Lograr la máxima experiencia posible en al menos 5 partes del juego.
